snippet: TrueCar.com promises to deliver a guaranteed price for a car, efforts that automakers have pushed back against, saying that they could eat into already thin profit margins.
abstract: Tara Siegel Bernard Your Money column discusses TrueCar.com, which promises to deliver a guaranteed price for a car; observes that automakers have pushed back against the site's efforts, saying that they could eat into already thin profit margins.
lead_paragraph: TrueCar.com promises to deliver a guaranteed price for a car, efforts that automakers have pushed back against, saying that they could eat into already thin profit margins.

headline.main: Car Dealers Wince at a Site to End Sales Haggling
headline.print_headline: Car Dealers Wince at a Site to End Sales Haggling
